note: The source defines AI models as "large-scale" when their training compute is confirmed to exceed 10²³ [floating-point operations](#dod:flop).
title: Cumulative number of large-scale AI models by domain
subtitle: Describes the specific area, application, or field in which a large-scale AI model is designed to operate. Data for 2024 is incomplete and was last updated on 19 June 2024.
